revised_title: Anatomical Observations of a Hydropical Testicle and Ovary
tldr: The author examines the anatomy of a woman who died with a hydropical testicle and observes numerous bladders related to the womb. The left ovary is found to be significantly swollen, containing the bladders filled with serum. This case study provides evidence for the function of the female ovary and the development of a fetus.
